INSERT INTO SDB_AM_MEDCIN_INFO ( MEDCIN_INFO_NO , HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE , PRDUCT_CODE , FOLLOW_NO , DRFSTFROLE_SE , MEDCIN_RECOED_NM , MEDCIN_NM , MFDS_BRAND_CODE , MFDS_GNRL_CODE , UNCONFM_MEDCINNM , BEGIN_DTES , CNTNC_AT , END_DTES , MDCTN_PD , RSTRCT_FORM , COURS , BATCH_LT_NO , FDQNT , UNIT , NCOUNT , INTRVL , INTRVL_UNIT , DIFR_USAGE_USER_INFO , SGN_MEMO , ABOVE_RESPNS_SE , DRFSTF_WTHDRAW___CPCTY_DCRS_SE , RECR_SE , DIFR_INFO , ATC_AT , ATC_VER , ATC_CODE , KCD_AT , KCD_VER , KCD_CODE , MEDDRA_AT , MEDDRA_VER , MEDDRA_LTT_CODE , REPORTR_DC_AT , REPORTR_DC_SE , SPON_DC_AT , SPON_DC_SE , USE_AT , FRST_CREDE , REGIST_ID , LAST_UPDDE , UPDATE_ID ) SELECT #CHANGE_MEDCIN_INFO_NO# AS MEDCIN_INFO_NO , HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE , PRDUCT_CODE , #CHANGE_FOLLOW_NO# AS FOLLOW_NO , DRFSTFROLE_SE , MEDCIN_RECOED_NM , MEDCIN_NM , MFDS_BRAND_CODE , MFDS_GNRL_CODE , UNCONFM_MEDCINNM , BEGIN_DTES , CNTNC_AT , END_DTES , MDCTN_PD , RSTRCT_FORM , COURS , BATCH_LT_NO , FDQNT , UNIT , NCOUNT , INTRVL , INTRVL_UNIT , DIFR_USAGE_USER_INFO , SGN_MEMO , ABOVE_RESPNS_SE , DRFSTF_WTHDRAW___CPCTY_DCRS_SE , RECR_SE , DIFR_INFO , ATC_AT , ATC_VER , ATC_CODE , KCD_AT , KCD_VER , KCD_CODE , MEDDRA_AT , MEDDRA_VER , MEDDRA_LTT_CODE , REPORTR_DC_AT , REPORTR_DC_SE , SPON_DC_AT , SPON_DC_SE , 'Y' AS USE_AT , SYSDATE AS FRST_CREDE , #UPDATE_ID# AS REGIST_ID , SYSDATE AS LAST_UPDDE , #UPDATE_ID# AS UPDATE_ID FROM SDB_AM_MEDCIN_INFO WHERE HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE = #HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE# AND PRDUCT_CODE = #PRDUCT_CODE# AND FOLLOW_NO = #FOLLOW_NO# AND MEDCIN_INFO_NO = #MEDCIN_INFO_NO#

INSERT INTO SDB_AM_MEDCIN_RCORD_INFO ( MEDCIN_RCORD_NO , HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE , PRDUCT_CODE , FOLLOW_NO , MEDCIN_RECOED_NM , MEDCIN_RCORD_NM , MFDS_BRAND_CODE , MFDS_GNRL_CODE , UNCONFM_MEDCINNM , BEGIN_DTES , END_DTES , SGN_MEMO , RESPNS_MEMO , ATC_AT , ATC_VER , ATC_CODE , MEDDRA_AT , MEDDRA_VER , MEDDRA_LTT_CODE , WHOART_AT , WHOART_VER , WHOART_ARRN_CODE , MEDDRAONE_AT , MEDDRAONE_VER , MEDDRAONE_LLT_CODE , USE_AT , FRST_CREDE , REGIST_ID , LAST_UPDDE , UPDATE_ID ) SELECT SDB_DRUGHISTORY_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS MEDCIN_RCORD_NO , HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE , PRDUCT_CODE , #CHANGE_FOLLOW_NO# AS FOLLOW_NO , MEDCIN_RECOED_NM , MEDCIN_RCORD_NM , MFDS_BRAND_CODE , MFDS_GNRL_CODE , UNCONFM_MEDCINNM , BEGIN_DTES , END_DTES , SGN_MEMO , RESPNS_MEMO , ATC_AT , ATC_VER , ATC_CODE , MEDDRA_AT , MEDDRA_VER , MEDDRA_LTT_CODE , WHOART_AT , WHOART_VER , WHOART_ARRN_CODE , MEDDRAONE_AT , MEDDRAONE_VER , MEDDRAONE_LLT_CODE , 'Y' AS USE_AT , SYSDATE AS FRST_CREDE , #UPDATE_ID# AS REGIST_ID , SYSDATE AS LAST_UPDDE , #UPDATE_ID# AS UPDATE_ID FROM SDB_AM_MEDCIN_RCORD_INFO WHERE HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE = #HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE# AND PRDUCT_CODE = #PRDUCT_CODE# AND FOLLOW_NO = #FOLLOW_NO#

INSERT INTO SDB_AM_HRMFLNS_CASE_DC ( CASE_DC_SN , HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE , PRDUCT_CODE , FOLLOW_NO , HRMFLNS_CASE_DC , REPORTR_OPINION , APLCNT_OPINION , DIFR_INFO , APLCNT_SAFE_REPRT_IDNTFR , MAIN_NATION_IDNTFC , RESPNS_OCCRRNC_NATION_IDNTFC , REPRT_KND , ADIT_PAPERS_AT , APLCNT_HOLD_DOC_LIST , RPD_REPRT_AT , REGL_INSTT_REPRT_NO , ETC_REPRT_NO , REFER_LTRTRE , RSRCH_NM , SPON_RSRCH_NO , RESPNS_OBSERV_RSRCH_TY , USE_AT , FRST_CREDE , REGIST_ID , LAST_UPDDE , UPDATE_ID ) SELECT SDB_NARRATIVE_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS CASE_DC_SN , HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE , PRDUCT_CODE , #CHANGE_FOLLOW_NO# AS FOLLOW_NO , HRMFLNS_CASE_DC , REPORTR_OPINION , APLCNT_OPINION , DIFR_INFO , APLCNT_SAFE_REPRT_IDNTFR , MAIN_NATION_IDNTFC , RESPNS_OCCRRNC_NATION_IDNTFC , REPRT_KND , ADIT_PAPERS_AT , APLCNT_HOLD_DOC_LIST , RPD_REPRT_AT , REGL_INSTT_REPRT_NO , ETC_REPRT_NO , REFER_LTRTRE , RSRCH_NM , SPON_RSRCH_NO , RESPNS_OBSERV_RSRCH_TY , 'Y' AS USE_AT , SYSDATE AS FRST_CREDE , #UPDATE_ID# AS REGIST_ID , SYSDATE AS LAST_UPDDE , #UPDATE_ID# AS UPDATE_ID FROM SDB_AM_HRMFLNS_CASE_DC WHERE HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE = #HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE# AND PRDUCT_CODE = #PRDUCT_CODE# AND FOLLOW_NO = #FOLLOW_NO#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT MAX(FOLLOW_NO) AS FOLLOW_NO ,MAX(MAFU_NO) AS MAFU_NO,PRDUCT_CODE,PRDUCT_NM, TO_CHAR(FRT_RCEPT_DTE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') FRT_RCEPT_DTE, REPORT_FLAG, HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE , INSTT_NO , TESTEE_NO FROM ( SELECT FOLLOW_NO,PRDUCT_CODE,FN_GET_PRDUCT_NAME(PRDUCT_CODE) AS PRDUCT_NM, MAFU_NO, FRT_RCEPT_DTE , CASE WHEN MFDS_REPORT_AT ='Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN KIDS_REPORT_AT ='Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN IRB_REPORT_AT ='Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN DIFR_INSTT_REPORT_AT ='Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN MANUFACTURER_AT ='Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS REPORT_FLAG , HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE , INSTT_NO , TESTEE_NO FROM SDB_AM_HRMFLNS_CASE_INFO ) WHERE 1=1
PRDUCT_NM LIKE '%'|| #PRDUCT_NM# ||'%'
GROUP BY PRDUCT_CODE,PRDUCT_NM, FRT_RCEPT_DTE, REPORT_FLAG, HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE , INSTT_NO , TESTEE_NO

SELECT HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE , PRDUCT_CODE , FOLLOW_NO , AE_NO , ADVERSE_EVENT , REPORTR_RELATION_ONE , REPORTR_RELATION_TWO , SPON_RELATION_ONE , SPON_RELATION_TWO FROM SDB_AM_AE_INFO WHERE 1=1
HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE = #HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE#
PRDUCT_CODE = #PRDUCT_CODE#
FOLLOW_NO = #FOLLOW_NO#
ORDER BY USE_AT ASC, MAIN_AE_AT DESC

SELECT MEDCIN_INFO_NO , DRFSTFROLE_SE , MEDCIN_RECOED_NM FROM SDB_AM_MEDCIN_INFO WHERE 1=1
HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE = #HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE#
PRDUCT_CODE = #PRDUCT_CODE#
FOLLOW_NO = #FOLLOW_NO#
ORDER BY DRFSTFROLE_SE
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SDB_AM_RELATE ( AE_NO , HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE , PRDUCT_CODE , FOLLOW_NO , MEDCIN_INFO_NO , DRFSTFROLE_SE , MEDCIN_RECOED_NM , REPORTR_RELATION_ONE , REPORTR_RELATION_TWO , SPON_RELATION_ONE , SPON_RELATION_TWO , USE_AT , FRST_CREDE , REGIST_ID , LAST_UPDDE , UPDATE_ID ) VALUES ( #AE_NO# , #HRMFLNS_CASE_CODE# , #PRDUCT_CODE# , #FOLLOW_NO# , #MEDCIN_INFO_NO# , #DRFSTFROLE_SE# , #MEDCIN_RECOED_NM# , #REPORTR_RELATION_ONE# , #REPORTR_RELATION_TWO# , #SPON_RELATION_ONE# , #SPON_RELATION_TWO# , 'Y' , SYSDATE , #UPDATE_ID# , SYSDATE , #UPDATE_ID# )
